data.description:
VR Singing Club is a virtual reality experience where people can share in wonder and joy through the medium of singing! Choose from a variety of classic songs and get ready to sing your heart out!

Future Plans
We have many exciting features on the horizon, with plans to let you socialize with others in fun, interactive environments and much more. Join our Discord to stay up and have your say!

"Happiness is singing together when day is through, and happiness is those who sing with you"
-- Clark Gesner

Sing With Melody and Mike:
Want a little practise on the side? Or playing a solo session and need someone to harmonize with?

Our NPCs are voiced by professional singing talent and are ready to be the Sonny to your Cher! Just hop in and select "Sing with Melody!" to try it out.

VR Worlds That Come Alive with Song:
Edith Piaf said: "Singing is a way of escaping. It's another world. I'm no longer on Earth."

In VR Singing Club we plan to build unique interactive environments that come alive with song. We want to bring you locations designed to elevate, immerse, and entertain.

Social Singing Club:
Once we release the full feature list, anyone will be able join a choir from the comfort of their own armchair.

A Dedicated and Growing Team of VR Veterans:
Development is on-going, and our team of passionate song birds have big plans for VR Singing Club. Expect future updates, big events and new features in the months ahead.

So what are you waiting for? Grab a microphone and jump in!
